function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious disease propagation in the built environment","Impact":"Health and safety risks for individuals and communities, strain on healthcare systems, economic and social disruption","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene and sanitation protocols, promoting vaccination, enforcing social distancing measures, improving indoor air quality, and enhancing public health infrastructure","Technologies":"Air purifiers, UV light sterilization, IoT-enabled monitoring systems, contactless technologies, and ventilation systems","People":"Residents, workers, and visitors in built environments","Owner":"Public health authorities, building owners, architects, urban planners"},{"Description":"Environmental impact of disease mitigation measures","Impact":"Increased use of single-use plastics, energy consumption, and waste generation","Mitigation":"Promoting sustainable and eco-friendly disease mitigation measures, reducing reliance on single-use materials, and adopting renewable energy sources","Technologies":"Biodegradable PPE, energy-efficient ventilation systems, and sustainable building materials","People":"General population and environmental conservation advocates","Owner":"Government agencies, environmental organizations, and industry stakeholders"},{"Description":"Impact on comfort of people spending most of their time at home","Impact":"Mental health issues, decreased physical activity, and reduced social interaction","Mitigation":"Providing access to mental health support services, promoting active lifestyle initiatives, and facilitating virtual social engagement","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, home fitness equipment, and virtual communication tools","People":"Individuals and families spending extended periods at home","Owner":"Healthcare providers, community organizations, and technology companies"}]}
